import React from 'react' const Weatherinfo = ({tempInfo}) => { const [weatherState,setWeatherState]=React.useState(""); const { temp, humidity, pressure, weathermood, name, speed, country, sunset, } =tempInfo; let sec=sunset; let date=new Date(sec*1000); let timestr=`${date.getHours()}:${date.getMinutes()} `; return ( <>

) } export default Weatherinfo
